verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bearing|strong="H3205"\w* \w any|strong="H7200"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w envied|strong="H7065"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* sister. “\w Give|strong="H3051"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*!” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

\w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w became|strong="H2734"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H4480"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w and|strong="H3290"\w* said, “Am \w I|strong="H8478"\w* \w in|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* God, who \w has|strong="H3290"\w* \w withheld|strong="H4513"\w* children \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* said, “\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* maidservant \w Bilhah|strong="H1090"\w*. Sleep \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w children|strong="H3205"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*,\f + \fr 30:3 \ft Literally bear children on my knees\f* \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* can \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* family.”

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* Rachel \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w Bilhah|strong="H1090"\w* \w as|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H3290"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* slept \w with|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bilhah|strong="H1090"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3651"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H1571"\w* \w vindicated|strong="H1777"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*; \w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w has|strong="H1571"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* plea \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.\f + \fr 30:6 \ft Dan means He has judged or He has vindicated.\f*

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w*’s \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w Bilhah|strong="H1090"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w In|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H7121"\w* great struggles, \w I|strong="H3201"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w wrestled|strong="H6617"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w my|strong="H7121"\w* sister \w and|strong="H8034"\w* won.” \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*.\f + \fr 30:8 \ft Naphtali sounds like the Hebrew for wrestling.\f* Gad and Asher

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w stopped|strong="H5975"\w* \w having|strong="H3205"\w* \w children|strong="H3205"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w Zilpah|strong="H2153"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w*’s \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w Zilpah|strong="H2153"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7121"\w* \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “How \w fortunate|strong="H1409"\w*!”\f + \fr 30:11 \ft Alternate MT reading (see also LXX); the other alternate reads “A troop is coming!”\f* \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*.\f + \fr 30:11 \ft Gad sounds like the Hebrew for good fortune, or alternately for band of raiders.\f*

\w When|strong="H1121"\w* \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w*’s \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w Zilpah|strong="H2153"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w Leah|strong="H3812"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w How|strong="H3588"\w* happy \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* happy.” \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* Asher.\f + \fr 30:13 \ft Asher means happy.\f*

\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w some|strong="H3117"\w* \w mandrakes|strong="H1736"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*. \w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* mother, \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* begged \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w some|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w mandrakes|strong="H1736"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H1571"\w* Leah replied, “\w Is|strong="H1571"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w not|strong="H1571"\w* \w enough|strong="H4592"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* husband? \w Now|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* want \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w mandrakes|strong="H1736"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w*?” “\w Very|strong="H3651"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w*,” \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w*, “\w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w tonight|strong="H3915"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w exchange|strong="H8478"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w mandrakes|strong="H1736"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w mandrakes|strong="H1736"\w*.” \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H3290"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*. Issachar, Zebulun, and Dinah

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* God \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H8198"\w* \w rewarded|strong="H7939"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* husband.” \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*.\f + \fr 30:18 \ft Issachar sounds like the Hebrew for wages or reward.\f*

\w Again|strong="H5750"\w* \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

“God \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w given|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w gift|strong="H2065"\w*,” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*. “\w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6471"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* husband \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w honor|strong="H8034"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w borne|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*.\f + \fr 30:20 \ft Zebulun sounds like the Hebrew for honor.\f*

\w After|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w*, Leah \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w* \w Dinah|strong="H1783"\w*. Joseph

\w Then|strong="H8085"\w* God \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w*. He \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w her|strong="H6605"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w her|strong="H6605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. “God \w has|strong="H3205"\w* taken away my \w shame|strong="H2781"\w*,” she said.

\w She|strong="H7121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*,\f + \fr 30:24 \ft Joseph means may He add.\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w another|strong="H3254"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.” Jacob Prospers

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w given|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Laban|strong="H3837"\w*, “\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w* \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H3212"\w* can return \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* homeland.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* wives \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H5414"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* hard \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w worked|strong="H5647"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w Laban|strong="H3837"\w* replied, “\w If|strong="H1288"\w* \w I|strong="H4672"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* stay. \w I|strong="H4672"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* learned \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w divination|strong="H5172"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w because|strong="H1558"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w added|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w Name|strong="H5344"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*, \w and|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* Jacob answered, “\w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* thrived \w under|strong="H5647"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* care.

\w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H6213"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* arrival, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wealth \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w increased|strong="H6555"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w times|strong="H7272"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w*. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* wherever \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w set|strong="H6213"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w provide|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*?”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*?” Laban \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. “\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w need|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w anything|strong="H1697"\w*,” \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* replied. “If \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w on|strong="H7462"\w* shepherding \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*.
